title: Close button moves down when view resized smaller
description: The close button in the Navigator view moves down when the view is resized to a smaller size. This causes a usability problem as users are accustomed to the close button being on the same line as the label, located to the far right corner.
OB: When the Navigator view is resized smaller on Linux using build 20011127, the tool items move below the label.
EB: The close button should stay on the same line as the label, regardless of how small the view gets.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the Navigator view.
2. Resize the view to a smaller size.
3. Observe that the tool items move below the label.
